1356870.name: Catwink
1356870.description:
Compete with up to 5 of your friends (or strangers) in this card-matching party game of chaos and mischief!

Get rid of all your cards by matching them with cards in the discard pile. Every card triggers an effect that can help you or hinder your opponents. Enhance your play with cards that grant extra turns, give your cards to other players, and redraw your entire hand. Force other players to draw more cards with Attack cards. Deflect attacks from your opponents by matching certain cards like Skip and Reverse. Up the ante by stacking more Attack cards. Copy your opponents with Copycat cards, or introduce even more chaos with Random cards.

Every card has potential to turn the tides of the game in your favor. Strategically use card effects to pull off surprise victories!
1356870.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
